item.title: Disruptive Innovation Theory: Airbnb Case Study
item.description: This article is a stripped-down version of an academic essay I’ve written on disruptive innovation theory and incumbent responses. The 20th century experienced an advancement in the fields of science and technology that surpassed all the advancements of the centuries before. The rapid development in information and communication technology, the internet and global connectivity laid the foundation for electronic commerce: an industry that rapidly grew up to $29 trillion by the early 21st century.
